text: Hello Guian.  I got Dom to take a look at your blog. Hopefully you remember meeting him when you were in. He was the guy with the beard who showed you his severed hand!  He studied animation so I thought he’d be a really good person to provide feedback and here it is.

Interactive Media and Games Design ~ Guian Benson-Quarm Blog Feedback

On first glance it is easy on the eyes and pretty straight forward with what content is available with the section bar on the right hand side although Home and blog button dont seem to do anything other than display a menu to different sections? Maybe the initial home screen could be more exciting. Display some of your work.

I found the infomation given was very interesting and descriptive in the first section and this followed through to the following Human figure and life drawing studies. Desplayed a good attention to detail both in description and drawing skill.

I enjoyed the section about animation, very informative with a variety of information to look though which displayed Guian’s thought process well from story boards, project breakdown and final outcome. Explained the different stages to the project and was easy to follow. Some images wouldn’t display?

Very impressive.

Dom Maidlow
Matchmove Artist/ CG Generalist
If you want to ask him any questions or say thank you his email is <mailto:dom.maidlow@unionvfx.com|dom.maidlow@unionvfx.com> :slightly_smiling_face:
Thanks Lucy he has some very useful feedback and I will be implementing it into my blog.
Also I finally got my first uni interview for AUBin the 6th of Feb :raised_hands::skin-tone-4:
Wow! That’s great Guian. How are you feeling about it?  Let me know if you want to come in and do a practice run or anything.
